Class KrystalFramework

java.lang.Object
krystal.framework.KrystalFramework
public class KrystalFramework extends Object
Launching from main() proposed flow:
  1. Set framework properties (variables, pre-loads, etc.);
  2. Either primaryInitialization(String...) or any of the "framePredefined" methods;
  3. Any sequence of initiation methods, or "runLater" calls.
See Also:
  • primaryInitialization(String...)
  • frameSpringConsole(String, List, String...)
  • frameSpringJavaFX(List, String...)
  • startTomcatServer(TomcatProperties)

    • selectDefaultImplementations

      public void selectDefaultImplementations(KrystalFramework.DefaultImplementation... selectedImplementations)
      Choose the default implementations of core framework components, to be loaded during Spring component scan.
      Parameters:
      selectedImplementations - If none, all default implementations will be loaded.

    • selectAllDefaultImplementationsExcept

      public void selectAllDefaultImplementationsExcept(KrystalFramework.DefaultImplementation... excludedImplementations)
      Choose all default implementations of core framework components, except selected, to be loaded during Spring component scan.
      Parameters:
      excludedImplementations - If none, all default implementations will be loaded.
